summary.span: Provides navigation and a user interface (UI) to collect related data across multiple steps.

span.span: Provides navigation and a user interface (UI) to collect related data across multiple steps.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [精靈元件Wizard Components](#components) - [精靈步驟Wizard Steps](#wizard_steps) - [資料收集精靈Collecting Wizard Data](#collecting_wizard_data) - [精靈 」 的命令名稱Wizard Command Names](#wizard_command_names) - [以動態方式變更步驟Dynamically Changing Steps](#dynamically_changing_steps) - [精靈的外觀Wizard Appearance](#wizard_appearance) - [使用版面配置範本Formatting Using Layout Templates](#formatting_using_layout_templates) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#accessibility) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 您可以使用控制項：You can use the control to: - 在多個步驟中收集相關的資料。Collect related data across multiple steps. - 分解為較大的 Web 網頁，用來收集使用者輸入成較小的邏輯步驟。Break up a larger Web page used to collect user input into smaller logical steps. - 可讓您逐步完成的線性或非線性導覽。Allow for either linear or nonlinear navigation through the steps. ## 精靈元件Wizard Components 控制項由下列元件組成：The control is made up of the following components: - A ，包含每個步驟的使用者介面頁面開發人員所定義的集合。A collection of steps that contain the user interface for each step, as defined by the page developer. - 內建導覽功能，以決定適當的按鈕，以顯示根據值。Built-in navigation capabilities that determine the appropriate buttons to display based on the value. - 標頭區域，您可以自訂以特定的資訊顯示給使用者目前所在的步驟。A header area that can be customized to display information specific to the step that the user is currently on. - 控制項中的步驟可用來快速瀏覽至提要欄位區域。A sidebar area that can be used to quickly navigate to steps in the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005，請注意，會保存在原始碼檢視。If you are using Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, note that the is persisted in Source view. 如果您變更提要欄位按鈕，而且您按一下 [設計] 檢視中的屬性，然後執行 [] 頁面的第一個步驟`Wizard`可能不會顯示控制項，因為可能指向不同的步驟。If you change the property in Design view by clicking the sidebar buttons, and you then run the page, the first step of the `Wizard` control might not be shown because the might be pointing to a different step. ## 精靈步驟Wizard Steps 每個中的步驟控制項有屬性，可決定此步驟中有的巡覽功能的類型。Each of the steps in the control has a property that determines the kind of navigation functionality that the step has. 如果您未指定的值屬性，預設值是。If you do not specify a value for the property, the default value is . 下表列出可用的設定屬性及步驟的結果行為。The following table lists the available settings for the property and the resulting behavior of the step. `WizardStepType.Auto` 巡覽某個步驟呈現出來的 UI 是由該步驟的宣告的順序決定。The navigation UI that is rendered for the step is determined by the order in which the step is declared. `WizardStepType.Complete` 步驟是要顯示的最後一個。The step is the last one to appear. 不會呈現巡覽按鈕。No navigation buttons are rendered. `WizardStepType.Finish` 步驟是收集使用者資料的最後一個。The step is the last one that collects user data. **完成**呈現巡覽按鈕。The **Finish** button is rendered for navigation. `WizardStepType.Start` 步驟是第一個出現。The step is the first one to appear. A **Previous**不會呈現按鈕。A **Previous** button is not rendered. `WizardStepType.Step` 此步驟是任何步驟之間的第一個和最後一個。The step is any step between the first and last. 應呈現出 [上一步] 和 [下一步] 巡覽按鈕。**Previous** and **Next** buttons are rendered for navigation. ## 資料收集精靈Collecting Wizard Data 使用控制項，可以透過線性或非線性導覽收集資料。Using the control, data can be collected through linear or nonlinear navigation. 非線性導覽的一些範例會略過不必要的步驟，或傳回至先前完成的步驟，以變更某些值。Some examples of nonlinear navigation are skipping unnecessary steps or returning to a previously completed step to change some value. 控制項會維護兩個步驟，因此不需要上一個步驟輸入的資料，這是要保存至資料存放區，直到所有的步驟及其狀態控制項都已完成。The control maintains its state between steps, so the data entered on a step does not need to be persisted to a data store until all the steps of the control have been completed. 或者，如果您想要收集的資料保存到資料存放區為每個步驟完成時，例如當就會引發事件，您應該設定屬性物件`false`，讓使用者無法回到先前完成的步驟，並變更資料，一旦已提交。Alternatively, if you want to persist the collected data to a data store as each step is completed, such as when the event is raised, you should set the property of the object to `false` so that the user cannot return to a previously completed step and change the data once it has been submitted. ## 精靈 」 的命令名稱Wizard Command Names 控制項繼承下列的命令名稱，從類別和類別： ， ， ，和。The control inherits the following command names from the class and class: , , , and . 精靈控制項會忽略這些命令名稱，並不包含任何特殊邏輯，可啟用下列命令來自動進行巡覽。The Wizard control ignores these command names and does not include any special logic to enable these commands to automatically work for navigation. 如果命令名稱中移除，或遺漏的按鈕在控制項，擲回任何例外狀況。If a command name is removed or is missing from a button in the control, no exception is thrown. 例如，如果遺漏的值 按鈕。 ，會擲回任何例外狀況。For example, if the button is missing a value for , no exception is thrown. ## 以動態方式變更步驟Dynamically Changing Steps 您可以使用方法或屬性以動態方式變更目前顯示於步驟控制項。You can use the method or the property to dynamically change the step that is currently displayed in the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果您以程式設計方式新增在`Page_Load`事件處理常式，您必須新增瀏覽到該頁面載入之前的步驟。If you programmatically add a in the `Page_Load` event handler, you must add the navigation to that step prior to the page loading. ## 精靈的外觀Wizard Appearance 外觀控制項可完全自訂透過範本、 面板和樣式設定。The appearance of the control is fully customizable through templates, skins, and style settings. 例如，您可以使用， ， ， ，並自訂介面屬性控制項。For example, you can use the , , , , and properties to customize the interface of the control. > [!NOTE] > 設定， ， ， ， ，或屬性重新建立的子控制項控制項。Setting the , , , , , or property recreates the child controls of the control. 如此一來，此程序中的子控制項的檢視狀態會遺失。As a result, the view state for the child controls is lost in the process. 若要避免這種情況下，明確地維持控制狀態明確地控制控制項的子項目，或避免讓範本內部的控制項。To avoid this situation, explicitly maintain the control state of the control's child controls explicitly, or avoid putting controls inside of templates. 請注意，控制項不支援特殊的 Microsoft Internet Explorer 轉譯的非標準或 quirks 模式。Note that the control does not support special Microsoft Internet Explorer rendering for non-standard or quirks mode. 若要取得最佳的 Internet Explorer 轉譯使用控制，請使用 Visual Web Developer 和 Visual Studio 中預設會新增的 XHTML 文件類型。To get the best Internet Explorer rendering using the control, use the XHTML doc type, which is added by default in Visual Web Developer and Visual Studio. ## 使用版面配置範本Formatting Using Layout Templates 控制項可讓您指定控制項的配置，而不需要您使用 HTML`table`項目。The control lets you specify the layout of the control without requiring you to use an HTML `table` element. 相反地，您可以使用`LayoutTemplate`項目來指定版面配置。Instead, you can use a `LayoutTemplate` element to specify the layout. 在範本中，您建立預留位置，表示其中的項目應該以動態方式插入控制項的控制項。In the template, you create placeholder controls to indicate where items should be dynamically inserted into the control. (這是類似於如何範本模型控制運作。)如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。(This is similar to how the template model for the control works.) For more information, see the property. ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合協助工具標準的標記資訊，請參閱[協助工具的 Visual Studio 及 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義控制項來收集使用者的名稱和位址，以及選擇輸入不同的送貨地址。The following code example demonstrates how to define a control to collect a user's name and address, with the option to enter a separate shipping address. 如果使用者未選取**SeparateShippingCheckBox**，藉此發出要求以加入不同的出貨地址控制項直接從移`Step2`來`Finish`。If the user does not select **SeparateShippingCheckBox**, thereby issuing a request to add a separate shipping address, the control moves directly from `Step2` to `Finish`. 上`Finish`步驟中，使用者可以選擇傳回開頭，即可控制**GoBackButton**; 不過，它會採用使用者`Step2`因為屬性`Step1`設為`false`。On the `Finish` step, the user has the option to return to the beginning of the control by clicking **GoBackButton**; however, it takes the user to `Step2` because the property for `Step1` is set to `false`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回物件中目前顯示控制項。The property returns the object that is currently displayed in the control. 屬性是唯讀的; 不過，您可以使用屬性來存取目前的屬性物件。The property is read-only; however, you can use the property to access the properties of the current object. 使用動態變更的屬性到不同物件。Use the property to dynamically change the to a different object. 或者，您可以使用方法，以動態方式設定屬性。Alternatively, you can use the method to dynamically set the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷哪個設為下一個步驟屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine which step to set as the next property of the control. 如果值`CheckBox1.Checked`是`true`，則屬性設定為`Wizard1.Step3`，否則屬性設定為`Wizard1.Step2`。If the value of `CheckBox1.Checked` is `true`, the property is set to `Wizard1.Step3`; otherwise, the property is set to `Wizard1.Step2`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性所提供的以零為起始的索引物件中目前顯示控制項。The property provides the zero-based index of the object that is currently displayed in the control. 您可以透過程式設計方式設定屬性，來控制哪些步驟，會在執行階段顯示給使用者。You can programmatically set the property to control which step is displayed to the user at run time. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005，請注意，會保存在原始碼檢視。If you are using Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, note that the is persisted in Source view. 如果您變更提要欄位按鈕，而且您按一下 [設計] 檢視中的屬性，然後執行 [] 頁面的第一個步驟`Wizard`可能不會顯示控制項，因為可能指向不同的步驟。If you change the property in Design view by clicking the sidebar buttons, and you then run the page, the first step of the `Wizard` control might not be shown because the might be pointing to a different step. 如果您設定的值會支援具有預設情況下的任何步驟的精靈，為應用程式的-1，發生下列行為：If you set the value of to -1 to support a wizard with no steps by default, the following behavior occurs: - 如果您以宣告方式設定為-1 或是集則為-1 做為預設值，控制項一律會嘗試轉譯精靈的第一個步驟。If you declaratively set to -1 or set it to -1 as a default value, the control will always try to render the first step in the wizard. - 如果您以程式設計方式設定為-1，控制項不會呈現。If you programmatically set to -1, the control will not render. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來設定屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to set the property of the control. 如果值`CheckBox1.Checked`是`true`，則屬性設定為`Wizard1.Step3`，否則屬性設定為`Wizard1.Step2`。If the value of `CheckBox1.Checked` is `true`, the property is set to `Wizard1.Step3`; otherwise, the property is set to `Wizard1.Step2`. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStepIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStepIndex/CS/wizardactivestepindexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStepIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStepIndex/VB/wizardactivestepindexvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以存取的衍生類別只因為從其`protected`修飾詞。The method can be accessed from a derived class only because of its `protected` modifier. 在衍生類別中，您可以使用方法，以判斷是否傳入的索引可以用來設定屬性。In a derived class, you can use the method to determine whether the index that is passed in can be used to set the property. 方法會傳回`false`如果傳入的索引是指已經存取且具有物件及其屬性設定為`false`; 否則它會傳回`true`。The method will return `false` if the index that is passed in refers to a object that has already been accessed and has its property set to `false`; otherwise, it will return `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立名為衍生的類別`CustomWizard`，並覆寫方法。The following code example demonstrates how to create a derived class named `CustomWizard` and override the method. 在提要欄位區域上的按鈕時`CustomWizard`按下控制項時，呼叫方法來判斷是否可以存取選取的步驟。When a button on the sidebar area of the `CustomWizard` control is clicked, the method is called to determine whether the selected step can be accessed. 通知的使用者所發生的情況在包含網頁接著會寫入一則訊息。A message is then written to the containing Web page informing the user of what has occurred. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardAllowNavigationToStep#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardAllowNavigationToStep/CS/wizardallownavigationtostepcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardAllowNavigationToStep#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardAllowNavigationToStep/VB/wizardallownavigationtostepvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時**取消**按鈕按一下控制項時。The event is raised when the **Cancel** button on the control is clicked. 使用事件來提供其他處理的時機**取消**按一下按鈕時。Use the event to provide additional processing when the **Cancel** button is clicked. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定的事件處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify an event handler for the event. 當**取消**按一下按鈕時，頁面會重新導向至http://www.wingtiptoys.com/。When the **Cancel** button is clicked, the page is redirected to http://www.wingtiptoys.com/. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會定義的外觀**取消**按鈕控制項。The property defines the appearance for the **Cancel** button on the control. 屬性是唯讀的; 不過，您可以在這裡設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表之屬性的類別 (例如`CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`). 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如`CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`). 一般設定包括自訂的背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 樣式設定屬性會合併使用的樣式設定屬性。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the property. 在任何設定也就套用屬性會覆寫中的對應設定屬性。Any setting that is applied in the property overrides the corresponding setting in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制的儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距。Use the property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell border. 指定的填補量會新增至儲存格的四個邊。The padding amount that is specified is added to all four sides of the cell. 資料行中的所有資料格會共用同一個儲存格的寬度;因此，間距已套用至資料行中最寬的資料格。All cells in a column share the same cell width; therefore, the spacing is applied to the widest cell in the column. 同樣地，相同的資料列中的所有資料格會共用相同的儲存格高度。Similarly, all cells in the same row share the same cell height. 因此，間距已套用至資料列中最高的儲存格。Thus, the spacing is applied to the tallest cell in the row. 個別儲存格大小不能指定。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用並屬性，以程式設計的版面配置以宣告方式控制。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and properties to program the layout of the control declaratively. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定之自訂內容上會顯示巡覽區域的步驟控制項。Use the property to specify the custom content that is displayed for the navigation area on the step of the control. 建立範本，指定 瀏覽區上的呈現方式來定義內容步驟。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the navigation area is rendered on the step. 如需範本的自訂內容包含在物件。The custom content for the template is contained within the object. 您可以新增自訂內容物件使用範本編輯模式在設計檢視中或藉由定義物件內嵌使用`FinishNavigationTemplate`標記。You can add custom content to the object either by using template-editing mode in design view or by defining the object inline using `FinishNavigationTemplate` tags. 內容可以是純文字格式的簡單或更複雜的 （將其他控制項內嵌在範本中，例如）。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). > [!NOTE] > 中所包含的物件屬性必須包含兩個控制項，一個具有其屬性設定為"MoveComplete 」，另一個則使用其屬性設為"MovePrevious 」，以啟用瀏覽功能。The object that is contained in the property must contain two controls, one with its property set to "MoveComplete" and the other with its property set to "MovePrevious", to enable the navigation feature. 若要存取的控制項，以程式設計方式定義在範本中，使用的集合物件。To access a control that is defined in a template programmatically, use the collection of the object. 您也可以使用方法要尋找控制項，如果控制項具有物件指定的屬性。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以建立導覽區域中的自訂範本步驟控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a custom template for the navigation area of the step for the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性來定義自訂使用者介面 (UI)控制項。You can use the property to define a custom user interface (UI) for the control. 若要指定版面配置範本，請新增`LayoutTemplate`內的項目控制項標記。To specify a layout template, add a `LayoutTemplate` element inside the control markup. 內部`LayoutTemplate`項目，新增元件的預留位置控制項。Inside the `LayoutTemplate` element, add placeholders for the components of the control. 瀏覽、 提要欄位中，與精靈步驟區段的預留位置控制項中所需`LayoutTemplate`項目。Placeholders for the navigation, sidebar, and wizard-step sections of the control are required in the `LayoutTemplate` element. > [!NOTE] > 您可以修改中的版面配置範本**來源**檢視。You can modify the layout template in **Source** view. 編輯中的版面配置範本**設計**不支援檢視。Editing the layout template in **Design** view is not supported. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何新增`LayoutTemplate`項目`Wizard`控制項，以及如何格式化組成`Wizard`控制項使用`div`項目。The following example shows how to add a `LayoutTemplate` element to the `Wizard` control and how to format the components of the `Wizard` control by using `div` elements. 控制項的呈現時，`div`而不是 HTML 表格格式化控制項使用的項目。When the control renders, the `div` elements will be used instead of HTML tables to format the control.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NavigationButtonStyle As Style
public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ NavigationButtonStyle { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets a reference to a object that defines the settings for the buttons in the navigation area on the control.

span.span: Gets a reference to a object that defines the settings for the buttons in the navigation area on the control.

value.span: 參考上定義巡覽區域中的按鈕的樣式設定。

span.span: A reference to the that defines the style settings for the buttons in the navigation area on the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性上定義巡覽區域中的按鈕的外觀控制項。The property defines the appearance for the buttons in the navigation area on the control. 屬性是唯讀的; 不過，您可以在這裡設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表之屬性的類別 (例如`CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`). 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如`CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`). 一般設定包括自訂的背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 樣式設定屬性會合併具有個別的按鈕樣式。The style settings for the property are merged with the individual button styles. 在個別的按鈕樣式屬性會套用任何設定會覆寫中的對應設定屬性。Any setting that is applied in the individual button style properties overrides the corresponding setting in the property. 比方說，如果您設定`FinishPreviousButtonStyle.ForeColor`屬性，以`"red"`和`NavigationButtonStyle.ForeColor`屬性設`"green"`，按鈕的色彩會變成紅色，因為個別樣式設定屬性覆寫的設定屬性。For example, if you set the `FinishPreviousButtonStyle.ForeColor` property to `"red"` and the `NavigationButtonStyle.ForeColor` property to `"green"`, the color for the button will be red because the individual style settings of the property override the settings of the property. 下列個別的按鈕樣式設定會覆寫屬性樣式：The following property styles are overridden by individual button style settings: - - - - - - - -

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按一下提要欄位區域上的按鈕時，會引發事件。The event is raised when a button on the sidebar area is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 事件不會引發事件，如果控制項取代屬性設定為`Move`屬於外部控制項的提要欄位清單物件。The event does not raise an event if a control with the property set to `Move` is outside of the control's sidebar list for the object. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定的事件處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify an event handler for the event. 每次引發事件時，會將訊息寫入至屬性`Label1`區域按鍵被按一下的 [資訊看板] 上的資訊。Each time the event is raised, a message is written to the property for `Label1` with information on which sidebar area button was clicked. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性的提要欄位上定義按鈕的外觀控制項。The property defines the appearance of the buttons on the sidebar of the control. 屬性是唯讀的; 不過，您可以在這裡設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表之屬性的類別 (例如`CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`). 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如`CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`). 一般設定包括自訂的背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 樣式設定屬性會合併使用的樣式設定控制項。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 會套用任何設定屬性覆寫的屬性中的對應設定控制項。Any settings that are applied in the property override the corresponding settings in the properties of the control. 下列樣式屬性會覆寫設定：The following style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - 不過，當您使用範本來定義的外觀控制資訊看板，屬性沒有任何作用。However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the control sidebar, the property has no effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含顯示的文字**下一步**按鈕步驟控制項。The property contains the text that is displayed for the **Next** button on the step of the control. 值而定屬性，屬性時，可以顯示為按鈕上的文字上，以文字顯示為不會轉譯映像的瀏覽器中的映像的替代項目或連結的文字。Depending on the value of the property, the property can appear as text on a button, as text displayed as an alternative to an image in browsers that do not render images, or as the text of a link. 下表列出的欄位值屬性，並在每個個別的效果**下一步**按鈕文字。The following table lists the field values for the property and the respective effect of each on the **Next** button text. 文字會出現在按鈕上。Text appears on the button. 文字會顯示為影像的替代文字。Text appears as alternative text for the image. 文字會顯示為連結。Text appears as a link. 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定之自訂內容上會顯示巡覽區域的步驟控制項。Use the property to specify the custom content that is displayed for the navigation area on the step of the control. 建立範本，指定 瀏覽區上的呈現方式來定義內容步驟。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the navigation area is rendered on the step. 如需範本的自訂內容包含在物件。The custom content for the template is contained within the object. 您可以新增自訂內容物件使用範本編輯模式在設計檢視中或藉由定義物件內嵌使用`StepNavigationTemplate`標記。You can add custom content to the object either by using template-editing mode in design view or by defining the object inline using `StepNavigationTemplate` tags. 內容可以是純文字格式的簡單或更複雜的 （將其他控制項內嵌在範本中，例如）。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). > [!NOTE] > 中所包含的物件屬性必須包含兩個控制項，一個具有其屬性設定為`"MoveNext"`部署，一個用於其屬性設定為`"MovePrevious"`，若要啟用瀏覽功能。The object that is contained in the property must contain two controls, one with its property set to `"MoveNext"` and one with its property set to `"MovePrevious"`, to enable the navigation feature. 若要存取的控制項，以程式設計方式定義在範本中，使用的集合物件。To access a control that is defined in a template programmatically, use the collection of the object. 您也可以使用方法要尋找控制項，如果控制項具有物件指定的屬性。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性傳回的集合構成物件控制項。The property returns a collection of objects that make up the control. 您可以使用集合，以存取中所包含的物件以程式設計方式控制。You can use the collection to access the objects that are contained in the control programmatically. 使用， ， ，以及方法來管理物件在集合中以程式設計的方式。Use the , , , and methods to manipulate the objects in the collection programmatically. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005，請注意，會保存在原始碼檢視。If you are using Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, note that the is persisted in Source view. 如果您變更提要欄位按鈕，而且您按一下 [設計] 檢視中的屬性，然後執行 [] 頁面的第一個步驟`Wizard`可能不會顯示控制項，因為可能指向不同的步驟。If you change the property in Design view by clicking the sidebar buttons, and you then run the page, the first step of the `Wizard` control might not be shown because the might be pointing to a different step. 如果控制項包含多個集合，集合將會合併。If the control contains multiple collections, the collections will be merged. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立以程式設計方式控制，以及如何使用方法來加入物件至集合。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control programmatically and how to use the method to add objects to the collection.
